scripts.prebuild: /bin/sh -c 'export $(grep -v ^'#' .env.local | xargs) && yarn eas-build-pre-install && npx expo prebuild --clean && rm -f ./google-services.json' && rm -f ./ios/.xcode.env.local
scripts.eas-build-pre-install: echo "This command is also run before `eas build` locally or in the cloud'" && echo "This command is also run before `eas build` locally or in the cloud'" && node generate-google-service-json.js
scripts.build-eas-then-submit:ios: eas build -p ios && eas submit -p ios --latest
scripts.build-local-then-submit:ios-ipa: /bin/sh -c 'export $(grep -v ^'#' .env.production | xargs) && eas build -p ios --local' && eas submit -p ios
scripts.build-local:ios-ipa:debug: echo "This script retains XCode logs for debugging build failures. Look for a message like 'Skipping cleanup, {path/to/logs} won't be removed.'" && /bin/sh -c 'export $(grep -v ^'#' .env.production | xargs) && EAS_LOCAL_BUILD_SKIP_CLEANUP=1 eas build -p ios --local'
